title: Retail_Store_Location_Optimization
name: Retail Store Location Optimization Using Pedestrian Traffic Patterns in Melbourne (2023)
description: Comprehensive analysis and modeling of retail store location strategies in Melbourne for the year 2023. This use case involves data manipulation, exploratory data analysis, spatial analysis, clustering, geospatial visualization, and actionable insights to identify high-potential zones for retail expansion.
datasets: Business Establishments Location and Industry Classification
